website_summaries.verdict: Baby Jogger's deluxe features and qualities in a lightweight yet rugged model.
pros: An updated version of a popular streamlined model that offers similar features to the City Select: reliable suspension, reclining seat, handlebar brake, canopy and more
cons: The under-seat storage compartment is on the small side

customer_reviews.title: Bought for theme park visits
customer_reviews.text: Pictured is my soon to be 3 year old and soon to be 7 year old, bought for theme park visit and already got good use out of it. Very comfortable and handy, being taller I appreciate the adjustable handle bar but I don't appreciate having to buy all the accessories. With that said I love the easy assemby and folding. It fits in our small car trunk without hassle. Also I appreciate the huge canopies specially when kids are napping. Pretty pricey but worth it in my opinion. Thank you Amazon for the nice discount.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Don't second guess just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: We've owned a few strollers over the course of raising 7 kids. Most recently a bob revolution, Phil and Ted navigator and city select doubles. This is by far the most versatile and my favorite out of them all. The brake is simple. The tires are awesome. The one hand fold is essential and I love it. My daughter is 3 but over 100% for height and it's been a struggle to fit her in a stroller. She doesn't ride often but occasionally does and will on our upcoming trip to universal. This stroller fits her no problem and it even fits my 8 (pictured)and 9 year olds who tried it out too. So highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: The real McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller for twins!
customer_reviews.text: An absolute must have for twins!! This stroller fits perfectly through standard size doorways, handles gravel and slightly tough terrain with ease, and has amazingly large sun canopys that blocks the sun from my 3 month old twins faces perfectly! It has a suspension like frame and works wonders on my gravel drive!! Also, I love the way the backs fold down for naptime and how the stroller itself folds with one quick pull!! Great stroller and definite must have for busy moms!!
customer_reviews.author: Rose G

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect stroller.
customer_reviews.text: I needed something smaller than my BOB Jogger but larger than an umbrella so I could get over most terrain. This is a very nice stroller. Great umbrella and brake. The seat material is also very nice. The cons are that the basket holds a bunch but isn’t the easiest to access for diaper bags or bulky items. Also, the most upright position is still a bit relaxed and I had to buy the snack tray so my child could safely sit forward and hold onto something still buckled. We will be keeping this stroller, I just wish for the price they could fix at least one of the two issues.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great, smooth and maneuverable stroller.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great stroller. It is easy to put together, and very maneuverable. We added the parent console and the child tray in the pictures, but unlike the double stoller we got from Baby Jogger, this came with the car seat adapter if you need that. It's a very smooth stroller overall. It does seem to not fold down quite as small as I'm used to from Baby Jogger but maybe I'm doing something wrong and I'll figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: The Warden Family

customer_reviews.title: I would give this more stars if possible!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! Turns on a dime and drives like a Cadillac! I love the black on black color and purchased the belly bar and double tray. My kiddos BEG to go out now. Seats are plush and stroller is sturdy, I drive a 2014 GMC Acadia with 3 rows and this folds down beautifully in the limited trunk space available WITH spare room.
customer_reviews.author: Nikol

customer_reviews.title: ... when I was State side and this was the best one I saw for traveling and best reviews after ...
customer_reviews.text: Well after going to store when I was State side and this was the best one I saw for traveling and best reviews after doing resreach. It got to my mother in laws house on time. But took a while to come overseas since no one wanted to ship to APO address not even the factory or Venders e.g. Buybuybaby, ToysRUs or even Amazon which we order a lot from. Super easy to put together and easy fold up and travel with specially in narrow European ally's/roads. Super smooth and pushing or running on flat ground and not to bad on the cobblestone roads either.
customer_reviews.author: Opie Trice

customer_reviews.title: Great product set
customer_reviews.text: Great product set. Car seat fits easily and securely into the base. Stroller wheels roll smoothly and lock securely. The adapter for mounting the car seat on the stroller can be improved to make it easier to fit and lock the car seat in place. After four months of use, I still have difficulty fitting the car seat on the stroller right at the first attempt. It often takes a few tries each time, which can be a source of frustration.
customer_reviews.author: BBB555

customer_reviews.title: In love with our stroller
customer_reviews.text: In love with our City Mini GT double stroller! So easy to push, even one handed! Easy to fold up, unfold. It has a wonderful locking device that automatically attached when folded to a certain degree, which makes it so much easier to just pick up and go. All the features are just so convenient and easy. I did purchase one tray for my toddler, but didn't realize you had to buy the belly bar in order to attach the tray, so I had to purchase that after the fact. also purchased an amazing stroller organizer for the handlebar. Fits perfect and has wonderful compartments for necessities and insulated drink holders. It's an "Ethan and Emma" stroller organizer.
customer_reviews.author: KristalG

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE my Citi Mini! The only thing I wish was a bit easier is unfolding. It is definitely a two hand process, maybe I just need some more practice. It is amazing on all terrains, and seems to be extra comfy for my 4 month old! I love that it came with the car seat adapters as that was the one hesitation I had getting a brand different than our car seat system. 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Samitch917

customer_reviews.title: Great Stiller if willing to sacrifice some amenities
customer_reviews.text: Lost a star because, despite extensive research beforehand, you are unable to use the Chico car seat. They no longer make the adapter so it’s a pain in the butt to use with my infant. However, the maneuverability is great and my toddler loves it. Lightweight so easy to lively and fold. Basket underneath is practically worthless except for blankets and jackets. No diaper bag will fit in that small space.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately I returned this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE trying out new strollers!! I was so excited about this one. I was looking for a car stroller. Unfortunately I just didn't feel like this one lived up to baby jogger standards. My canopy clasp was broken on arrival. The foot rest being adjustable is nice to have but the mechanics of it are horrible. Fold is amazing. But it is still very wide once folded so it was too big to be my car stroller. Just wasn't what I was hoping for. Maybe next year baby jogger!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is a luxury, but well worth it. It's really well designed--the pull-up closing mechanism, the easy carseat attachment, and the double canopy. The handle is adjustable, but we haven't had the need to tinker with it even though there's substantial difference in height between my husband and I. If you plan to use two vehicles regularly, purchase an extra base.
customer_reviews.author: J. Venegas

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've made regarding strollers. It was pricey and I was worried about it not being as good as I was told. I'm glad I listened to everyone. This is by far the best stroller I've ever purchased. Glides so easy, very light. Easy to fold and I can see myself using this when they're much older and bigger. Even fits my 8 yr old with no problem. So stylish and chic. Worth every penny. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Krell

customer_reviews.title: very wide back wheels and super heavy.
customer_reviews.text: 1. very heavy...I have no idea how my wife needs to fold it and lift it around, for example in bus or into car. 2. Very wide back wheels, for some reason the wheels goes out of the stroller frame, and it's just horrible, the wheels get stuck in door ways and places all the time... 3. cannot stand the stroller when its folded, only can lay down
customer_reviews.author: av

customer_reviews.title: It’s like pushing a cloud
customer_reviews.text: This thing is heavy, there’s no denying that. But it glides like no other. With two children in it, I can still push and steer one handed with minimal effort. It folds fairly flat considering and it fits in my sedan trunk with room to spare. The biggest complaints I have (total first world problems): no cupholder, the seats cannot sit up all the way. They’re always slightly reclined. And it’s hard to get into the cargo net. It’s easiest through the side, but it’s hard nonetheless. Pros: easy to push and steer, adjustable grippy handlebar, cushioned seats, simple to fold and open, wheel lock is hand operated
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t like it, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this stroller. I used brutal b agile with me first Child and loved it and this seemed like an upgraded version of what I used to have. But this stroller turned out to be bulky and heavy. It also doesn’t really stand on its own when folded - you have to really adjust it a few times to make it stand. I ended up returning this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality travel system!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using the baby jogger travel system for three months and it works great! It's extremely easy to snap the car seat carrier into the car seat base and the stroller. The stroller is extremely easy to unfold and fold up while out and about with my newborn and easy to maneuver around shopping centers, parks, neighborhoods, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Instant difference between our cheap jogger and this
customer_reviews.text: We instantly noticed the quality difference between our $100 jogger and this. This is so smooth and well built and it must be more comfortable because our toddler loves riding in it and always fought the other jogger. The attachments we got for it fit perfectly and make it a complete package. Assembly was pretty easy, the instructions are just pictures and not very helpful but luckily it was quiet easy to just figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: kduff85

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Recieved this stroller and was pleasantly surprised how easy it was to assemble! Unfortunately the handlebar was broken and when I contacted Capital Kidz, I was able to speak with Abraham who was beyond helpful and assisted me in getting a new handlebar directly from Baby Jogger. Was a pain that I spent so much and the handle was broken but I understand things happen and he went out of his way to make it right. Took me about 20 minutes to dissemble and fix the handlebar this morning. It rides so smooth and easy to maneuver. I am beyond pleased with this purchase and look forward to many adventures with my boys.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Best nonjogging double stroller
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is great for two kids. Fits through normal doorways and is easy to steer. Folding and unlocking is easy once you get used to it. It is a bit heavy and takes up a good chunk of space in the trunk. Infant car seat adapter works well with it but you can have that and a toddler tray on at the same time. Another downside is it’s low storage space. It is a bit challenging taking an infant car seat in and out using the adapter. We bought a cup holder and organizer to attach to the handlebar and that works great. Overall definitely my favorite nonjogging double stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very smooth
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 7 months old son. quality wise its much better than Chicco and other strollers. Pro: all wheel suspension air filled tires smooth maximum weight limit is 65lb. Cons: its not stand after folding non functional bag space / storage space. its too small for diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Faraz

customer_reviews.title: We returned this stroller
customer_reviews.text: This stroller makes too much road noise. It did not feel sturdy enough walking with to even consider jogging with when kids were loaded in. There are no interior pockets for kids’ drinks/snacks. The brake latch seemed very flimsy and was not easily accessible from the handle. There is also no safety strap on the handle. My two year old hardly fit in the bucket seat and had to lean forward out of the seat to see left or right (even with the seat back in the complete vertical/upright position). One pro - the canopy did provide full coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing stroller. I love! It can be maneuvered with one hand, easy to navigate over rocks or obstacles and very secure for baby. The canopy is sturdy and has a nice sized view window. Keep in mind the weight... I wouldn’t want to lug it up a flight of stairs but appreciate it folds down to fit through doorways easily. You won’t regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my two boys!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my two boys! I have a big 2 1/2 year old and a 1 year old. Love this stroller because both have their own individual space and both can recline. Only con is we need to buy attachments like cup holder, foot trays, etc... on for our trip to amusement parks and such as this is not included. Still not a deal breaker as other brands work similarly. Still 5 stars in my books!
customer_reviews.author: Evert Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this stroller because I was traveling to the Caribbean and needed something that I can be easily folded/compact Lightweight and durable. This stroller seems to tick all the boxes. However it’s a nightmare. Firstly the stroller is leaning and pulling to the right making it hard to push. Secondly, because of leaning my son fell out of the stroller . Now am stock in the Caribbean without a stroller because my son would not ride in it. Trust me the last place you want to be without a stroller is on a tiny island where transportation is not guarantee. Spending $400.plus I expect better. So returning it ASAP I get back.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Fafinski

customer_reviews.title: Awful product
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this 0 stars. I bought this stroller for my 3 year old as it has a higher weight limit. My child doesn’t even weigh 30lbs and he climbed in and the frame fell apart. All the screws popped out, it stripped the inside and i couldn’t even put a replacement screw in. So disappointed when spending so much for a stroller that is suppose to have a 60+ weight limit.
customer_reviews.author: Estella

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product, lethargic customer service
customer_reviews.text: The product came with a broken part, on contacting the customer service - they asked to send details in an email. The customer service is really laid back and not at all good, they keep asking for the same info. again and again. It's like they don't want to send even the smallest/pettiest part that we need to assemble the stroller. Such pathetic customer service for a $400 stroller is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Ragini Jain

customer_reviews.title: AMAZON OVERCHARGES ITS CUSTOMERS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This review deals with the fact that I bought this stroller from Amazon for a baby shower present....when I was rechecking the registry, I found that the stroller now cost $100.00 less. I called to get a price adjustment credit and I was told that the better price is offered by a third party vendor and Amazon would not adjust the price. But I could return the stroller and reorder at the lower price. Really...the gift is already given.....Angie, the supervisor was very unhelpful and I now regret my thousands of purchases over many years from Amazon. Amazon has gotten too big and too impersonal.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Schlein

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller ever
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough positive about this stroller. My two year old fits comfortably in it and it is the only stroller he has ever been in that he doesn’t ask to get out right away. I love the big sun shade on it as well, it gives me comfort knowing my little one is safe from harmful UV rays.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For tall kids
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed! My 3 year old is 42" tall and I needed a replacement from our Müv (which is excellent quality). It was so difficult to find a stroller with a long enough seat back, high enough leg support, and large high canopy. This stroller satisfies all of our needs. We took it for a test drive and it handles smoothly over sidewalk, pavement, and grass. Plus, my LO actually likes being in it.
customer_reviews.author: dani lee

customer_reviews.title: Too slim of a design.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice stroller and folds very easily. Im really disappointed with the foot well. I splurged on this stroller because my son is tall and Baby Jogger has such good reviews. But his legs dangle and his feet don't fit into the foot rest area comfortably. Wish I had just bought the original and not the GT2.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS STROLLER! Seriously, once you use a stroller like this, you can never go back to an umbrella stroller. It moved through the Disney crowds with ease, it rolls over rocky areas, snow, hills. My 3 1/2 year old is 40” tall and fits in it with room to grow. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kr1sten

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The concept of this stroller is amazing. It is easy to fold and steer. However everytime I folded it to try to put it away I would have the wheels fall out. Which is not a good time struggling with a double stroller and trying to find where the wheel went
customer_reviews.author: Lauren-Ashley Berlanga

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this set!
customer_reviews.text: Love this travel system. I have gotten so many comments on how padded the car seat is and the safety of it from doctors and nurses. The stroller is nothing but amazing. Smooth ride for our baby. Love that it is convertible by putting the car seat in it and then transitioning to the seat. Can't say enough good things about this!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Breault

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is very compact. I have a Suv and it fit nicely in the suv with lot of extra storage. The weight seems high 36.5lbs compare to my 28lbs uppababy vista but when fold, the gt2 double stroller lift more easily and easier to carry. It is very smooth as well. Overall, i am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent double stroller. Con- airlines will force you to check this with luggage at check in. Will not allow you to check it at gate. Does not come with cup holders. Required to buy those separately which is a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny & Hannah Incarnato

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller, fits through regular entrance doors
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller, fits through regular entrance doors. Basket under is large but slightly hard to access, and the parent cup holder attachment is kinda flimsy and small. Very easy to maneuver even with one hand. Easy to walk or jog with on any surface I have been on. Loving it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Christina T

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is worth the splurge. It handles so well that I can push it with one hand and carry a shopping basket in the other hand. This is a must if you like going on regular walks with your baby. The only drawback for me is that the wheel base is wider than the handlebar. This has misled me many times in judging spaces when maneuvering it, leading me to accidentally brush the wheel against a store shelf amongst other objects. This has caused me to stumble and be slightly embarrassed! I still love the stroller though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to please consumer pleased with this stroller.
customer_reviews.text: I have searched for a double stroller for a long time. I went back and forth on several different models. My criteria were side by side, lightweight, reliable brand, intuitive, and available accessories. This stroller truly fit the bill. I am hard to please and get easily frustrated with poorly executed design. So far, I've only found one flaw: when a Maxi Cosi car seat is snapped in using the adapters, the other seat's canopy does not open or close well. Other than that, it's a beautiful stroller and I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Soooo happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Soooo happy with this purchase. The stroller is sturdy, easy to use, and rolls over bumpy streets with ease. Had CHP install the car seat base and really like the feature of how you can tighten and loosen the seatbelt straps & lift the headrest up too (some car seats are so difficult!)
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is awesome! I'm wondering why I didn't have it with the first kid. So easy to fold and put in car. The carseat adapters are the simplest ones I've tried. We bought three different strollers and this was the best. I knew with the first use that it was a keeper. Drives well, even on gravel as long as the front wheel is locked. The only dislike is that it wants to tip over easy if turned too quickly. But that is remedied by the user being more aware of what they're doing. Hopefully once the baby is big enough to be out of carseat with use it will not happen.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Narrow and easy fold
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stroller. We have the bob and this. This also pushes very easily. What I like most is the narrowness of the whole thing. Also, as the handle bar is adjustable, my older son enjoys being able to push his baby brother. I think this is added perk. It glides nice enough on a paved road. I would prefer to take the bob on dirt road though because this doesn't really have good shock absorbers.
customer_reviews.author: Russell-san

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We tried many strollers at the store before choosing this one. It opens and folds up easily, is easy to push, and my Graco infant car seat clicks right in with the included car seat attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: great for a bigger age gap
customer_reviews.text: We have an infant and a tall, heavy 3.5 year old. This left us with few double stroller options due to weight restrictions. This stroller is absolutely perfect for what we need and is almost easier to push and maneuver with both kids in it than our single stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Bought for our unborn grandchild
customer_reviews.text: Parents love it and said it is just what they wanted. We will see the baby's first response in April and have a better understanding of how the baby likes it in about nine months. It is built really well and was easy to put together. Not yet installed.
customer_reviews.author: Donald T. Root

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for new parents
customer_reviews.text: Have not actually started using it yet but in the testing phase it was smooth as butter on hot plate definitely for all terrains I live in du ai and for sure the big tires will be amazing for the sand the best part is the one hand fold as my wife won’t be the one doing that bit so it’s great for me a lot of room underneath and goes perfect with the new born car seat we purchased separately so the car seat adapters are good to be included in the box definitely recommend this one
customer_reviews.author: Zohaib Khalid

customer_reviews.title: Better than most other jogging strollers on the market
customer_reviews.text: Although had a breakage issue with harness, customer service helped regarding this matter. Took a little longer to receive parts, but stroller itself is very comfortable for baby and one hand open and close
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best double stroller on the market
customer_reviews.text: I have three kids. A four-year-old, two-year-old, and a five-month-old. I have owned lots of double strollers and tried almost all of them, but nothing compares to this stroller! It is so lightweight folds up so easy, and fits in any trunk! It fits through every doorway at the mall and even front doors to houses and apartments. We purchased the glider board as an add on and it works perfectly for my four-year-old to stand or sit on! It’s the most light weight stroller I can push all three kids with a finger! I get so many compliments, I highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Amazing double stroller
customer_reviews.text: I tried many double strollers before purchasing this one. Fits through doorways, compact fold, works perfect with car seat adapter and very easy for everyday use! The push is great on any terrain and the GT wheels are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Gattuso

customer_reviews.title: ... knew opening and closing a stroller could be so easy! It is great in grass/dirt
customer_reviews.text: I never knew opening and closing a stroller could be so easy! It is great in grass/dirt. That was essential because we spend a lot of time at baseball fields. It is very smooth ride. I wish the basket underneath was bigger and that it had a cup holder. I purchased a stroller organizer that hangs as a solution to that. Great stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Life changing. Smaller than a BOB. Larger than Umbrella stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Life Changing! I needed something smaller than my BOB but larger than an umbrella Stroller. This is perfect. I have a third row in my SUV which I now utilize all the time for my older two kids and their friends. The stroller is perfect and that I get to carry it with me everywhere and have my third row up and available for littles all the time!! This stroller actually provided more room for her torso and head than my BOB stroller, with room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Moe Shay Sellitto

customer_reviews.title: Near perfection
customer_reviews.text: Drives so well, I instantly forgot about my old stroller. My only wish is the basket could be larger or easier to get to but other than that it’s absolutely perfect. It fits both my boys who are twins.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Not so easy to open
customer_reviews.text: Love the maneuverability but it’s wide and heavy so it take some strength and agility to open and close. I can imagine that if your under 5’6 it would be trickier to open and close because you need to hold the stroller away from your body
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Must have for twins!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stroller we own and with 4 kids and set of twins it is a must! It is the most convenient and easy to use stroller I have ever used, very durable and endless features. A MUST have for twins!
customer_reviews.author: Priya T.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is so perfect for me and my family that we literally bought ALL the accessories. We have 3 kids who are 3 months, 16 months, and 3 years old. We live in a small town so I usually just walk everywhere. Jogging strollers are nice but a little overboard for my needs, but regular double strollers can't meet my needs. This is the perfect in-between! The tires are really tough and it's incredibly easy to maneuver the whole thing. It's easy to clean, my kids love how durable yet stylish the entire stroller is. Everyone keeps asking me where I got it. I would recommend this to any family!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Herrington

customer_reviews.title: Nice stroller
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stroller. My only complaint is after washing the stroller canopy it began to fray around the stitching. I did not put in the dryer. Also the fabric that protects the bottom seatbelt the stitching has unravelled. I did not put in dryer. For the price of this stroller I dont feel like this should of happened after a few washes.
customer_reviews.author: MsHappi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to open with one hand
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter. My daughter and son in law love the ease of opening and the easy change from stroller to separate car seat.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research to include talking to family and friends before deciding on this stroller. It maneuvers extremely well and I can also take it “off-roading” and still handles well. Folds up easily too. Couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Love love this stroller! We purchased it along with the Bag and gate checked it on both legs. Worked great! Easy to assemble and take a part when you need to! Highly recommend. The bag underneath is also flexible and huge. My favorite part would be the adjustable handle and the oversize canopy!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Meyn

customer_reviews.title: Comfy stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller! Only minus is that storage basket is very small and hard to reach. And sometimes can be hard with the buckle. Other than that I love it
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: 💯 would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this stroller about 3 months but am already in love! - It is SUPER easy to fold & load into your car. - Way cheaper than some other brands for the same quality. - It reclines completely flat so I can take my infant on walks. I bought a head bumper to keep her head from moving & she absolutely loves our walks. Only con: It is a bit challenging to access the basket because of the metal bar.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Maneuvers beautifully..
customer_reviews.text: Maneuvers beautifully... even took it for a walk with snowy roads and made it through. Fits my girls great (tall almost 3yr old and baby). Bought the adaptor for my Graco car seat and was very easy to install. My only complaint is that I can't figure out how to install the car seat adaptor and keep the canopies attached to it at the same time. Also fits into the trunk of my little Nissan Sentra with some room to spare. 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size stroller! Fits through average doorways and store aisles. Very agile, amazing turn radius. The additional updates like the foot rest and magnetic window covers are awesome aswell! My son loves riding in it and I love how easy it is to put him in it! My only complaint is that the storage basket is not very large and is somewhat difficult to access. Otherwise I absolutely love this stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: A Mommy Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is amazing! My 5 year old who is very tall and my 1 year old both fit! It's easy to push and maneuver! It fits in most stores and both kids can fully recline after a long day out and about! We've tried so many different strollers but these strollers are built to last, it's worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Helena B.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set so much! The infant seat is lighter than most we tested out and the stroller is so smooth it glides. Stroller is very easy to fold and unfold making outings super easy.
customer_reviews.author: andrie

customer_reviews.title: Must buy this stroller.
customer_reviews.text: I love the baby jogger mini GT stroller. It is easy to fold and carry. The stroller is easy to push and provides a smoother ride compared to others. I like the larger canopy. It does not come with built in cup holders; however, may be purchased as an accessory. The stroller may be used from birth with an insert as it does lay down flat.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Came to me with scratches on it already which was disappointing, but other than this small cosmetic issue, the stroller is great.
customer_reviews.author: kristin flores

customer_reviews.title: obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: so obsessed with this double stroller, it took me forever to find one that works for our 2 kiddos that are 18 months apart. Extremely lightweight for a double stroller, fits through all standard doorways, + is easily maneuvered with one hand. My only complaint is that there isn’t very much storage below but not enough to go down from a 5 star review, just inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Miller

customer_reviews.title: Our girls seem very comfortable when we take walks
customer_reviews.text: Our girls seem very comfortable when we take walks. We have a soon to be 4 year old and a 14 month old. They love it. And for a double stroller, it's not too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Manning

customer_reviews.title: Solid stroller but way to heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller but sometimes side by side makes it inconvenient to get into places. And way to heavy, needs to be 50% lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Boston

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Built very well.
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy our purchase. As soon as we got it we took it to a beach for a few days and then to a forest. It drives smoothly on sand and on dirt. It's very durable and is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarai

customer_reviews.title: Best Stroller Out There!!
customer_reviews.text: Baby number 6 and this is the best stroller we've owned. The maneuverability functionality as a jogger is phenomenal. Extremely lightweight and folds up quickly and easily. Takes up minimal space for a stroller.
customer_reviews.author: jll8

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller - Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: We love this stroller! So easy to maneuver and fold. Not the lightest but still easy enough for me to manage. Easy to wipe off dried spit off the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Robust, Relatively Easy to Handle
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is robust and relatively easy to use for "one-hand" operation. Easy to pack up, and easy to store. Take it on the subway frequently. However, might have considered a smaller stroller for an urban center like NYC.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Wong

customer_reviews.title: City mini for the win
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd child and after many attempts at finding the perfect stroller, I will never own anything other than a city mini jogger! It fits between clothes racks, perfect on the trails, folds up to fit in smaller cars and has accessories to adapt to whatever you need it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller/Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: We love out Citimini set. It is a very easy stroller to fold and unfold and is very easy to maneuver. The carseat seems very comfortable to our baby and is very easy to put into the stroller and into the base for the car.
customer_reviews.author: Alestin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing job!
customer_reviews.text: This thing feels like floating with you while in use.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Centeno

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Compact, handles well! I have the board attachment for my 4 year old and it makes getting around with her and an infant so much easier. She is old enough where a double stroller doesn’t make sense so this was the perfect option for us.
customer_reviews.author: jessica wetzel

customer_reviews.title: Standing up!
customer_reviews.text: I gave the product five stars because it has the most functions that built for. The only thing I wish to take care of is when folding the Stroller, I hope there is a way to make it stand up. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: best stroller out there
customer_reviews.text: best stroller out there. Got rid of our double, and use this for the 1 year old, and an umbrella for the 4 year old. very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Laken Mader

customer_reviews.title: Easy to push and lightweight!!!
customer_reviews.text: I know that it is pricey, but it is absolutely worth the cost. I did a lot of research before I decided to buy this GT stroller. I absolutely love it, it makes my life easier. The stroller is unbelievably easy to push and it is such a smooth ride whether one the sidewalk, in the mall or even going over the grass. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ocean

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this stroller. So easy to open/close and way nicer to push then my single Chicco stroller! My only complaints are that the storage compartment is pretty small and hard to get items in and out with the middle bar, and that everything is Velcro (windows on the canopy, fabric on back to allow more airflow) which does not help keep a sleeping baby asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Moen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It is a great design, good quality, very smooth on basically any terrain, but it is definitely not light, but it is because it is a good design with good quality parts that will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to open for a short person.
customer_reviews.text: Its very difficult to open for a short person. Never recommend this product whose height is around 5'2". You might get backache of this.
customer_reviews.author: Santosh kumar

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to fold
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product very easy to fold up. Really light weight
customer_reviews.author: Tony S.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the stroller however it does not fit through the ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the stroller however it does not fit through the doorways so it only works outside if it wasn’t so expensive I would’ve kept it
customer_reviews.author: Katie Ganovsky

customer_reviews.title: I feel like the carrier doesn't click into the stroller easily
customer_reviews.text: I feel like the carrier doesn't click into the stroller easily. You have to feel around for the correct placement. Otherwise, my baby loves her car seat and stroller rides. The stroller turns easily.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick B.

customer_reviews.title: Baby Jogger City Mini GT2
customer_reviews.text: This stroller came highly recommended and I am so glad we purchased it. It is easy to fold, and has the best wheels! I cannot wait for my little man to be here so we can hit the trails with it together.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Yep. 100% to everything. Love this stroller . I uave 4 kids totally durable
customer_reviews.author: Christy Stock

customer_reviews.title: Best Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Took this with us for a flight from us to korea and was very easy to manage and great for taking kids through the city as it fits through all standard doors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for crappy SF streets
customer_reviews.text: After shopping for strollers till I was blue in the face, we settled on the city mini gt. Good options for kids car seat. Folds down to a manageable size. Not too heavy and the knobby tires are clutch for the San Francisco street and side walks that are in disrepair.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolai Krishpinovich

customer_reviews.title: Buy this stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stroller. By far the best thing for traveling anywhere!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Saves time and hassle - worth the premium
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and extremely easy to get back in car (takes me about 3 seconds now to fold it, put in trunk, and close trunk). Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Yiorgo Achilleos

customer_reviews.title: Light, easy to fold
customer_reviews.text: I had a few different strollers and this one is definatelly my favorite one!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Easy fold, little difficulty to open.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fold and moves great. Little Hard to unfold when opening. However, it was what I asked for and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: This stroller came broken. :( after I got it all assembled I realized the handlebar isn’t attached right. I expect better from a stroller at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: katherine weyerhaeuser

customer_reviews.title: Misleading like new
customer_reviews.text: When reviewed item said it was like new, however I looked over it and there are multiple water stains and dings all over the stroller and car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Savanna

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to fold. Rolls like a dream. Seems like it’s built to last. Happy with this stroller. Wish there was a bit more storage but with one of the third party organizers, this stroller is perfect for getting two kids around.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Rolls like butter. Good price compared to in store and ...
customer_reviews.text: Rolls like butter. Good price compared to in store and even used ones. Not quite a bulky jogger but it can handle slightly more rough terrain the most strollers.
customer_reviews.author: Proud papa

product_meta.title: Baby Jogger City Mini GT2 Stroller, Jet
product_meta.description: Style:New Model| Color:Jet| Size:SingleThe Baby Jogger City Mini GT2 Stroller has an all new design with forever air rubber tires and all wheel suspension, providing un compromised agility on any terrain. The signature one hand compact fold, adjustable handlebar, and hand operated parking brake provides you the ultimate convenience while the adjustable calf support and near flat seat recline allow you to find the most comfortable position for your child. Create a travel system using the included City GO infant car seat adapters (car seat sold separately) or customize your ride with a variety of accessories
feature_bullets: SAFE AND SNUG: Stroller seat holds a child up to 65 pounds and includes a 5 point stroller harness to keep your child safely secured
UNCOMPROMISED AGILITY: Stroller has forever air rubber tires with all wheel suspension, providing uncompromised agility on any terrain
ONE HAND FOLD: Lift a strap with one hand and the City Mini GT2 stroller folds itself simply and compactly
CREATE A TRAVEL SYSTEM: Add a City GO Infant Car Seat using the included City GO infant car seat adapters (car seat sold separately) and go anywhere from day one
COMFORTABLE FOR PARENTS: Adjustable handlebar and hand operated parking brake provides comfortable steering and control all within arm's reach

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars548 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
